sentences.sentence: She was brought face-to-face with the horrors of war.
Anne Frank personalized the horrors of the Holocaust in her own words.
sentences.translation: 安.弗兰克用她自己的话使大屠杀的恐怖个人化。

sentences.sentence: She was at an early age brought face to face with the horrors of war.
sentences.translation: 她年幼时就面临战争的恐怖。
